snippet: A federal suit paints Standard & Poor's as willing to cut corners to keep its customers - much as the accounting firm Arthur Andersen did in the Enron scandal, Floyd Norris writes in The New York Times.
abstract: A federal suit paints Standard & Poor's as willing to cut corners to keep its customers - much as the accounting firm Arthur Andersen did in the Enron scandal, Floyd Norris writes in The New York Times.
